definitions.text: a low continuous indistinct sound; often accompanied by movement of the lips without the production of articulate speech
a schwa that is incidental to the pronunciation of a consonant
an abnormal sound of the heart; sometimes a sign of abnormal function of the heart valves
a complaint uttered in a low and indistinct tone

examples: She murmured softly to the baby in her arms

definitions.text: make complaining remarks or noises under one's breath
examples: she grumbles when she feels overworked
